item.title: Hanesbrands Inc 10-K
item.description: Hanesbrands Inc, which is in the Retail-Apparel & Accessory Stores [5600] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 08, 2023 had 43155 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 557 instances company - 517 instances 1 - 371 instances financial - 351 instances business - 274 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
